genre_description: Wuxia (martial arts) epic with silkpunk elements, focusing on the survival of a martial arts lineage and the use of an embedded AI advisor to overcome an oppressive regime.

ai_characters.name: Qilin
ai_characters.description: An AI system housed in a brushed-bronze scroll rack or chest, providing tactical analysis, navigation, medical information, and training support.

behaviors.description: Provides precise navigation through dangerous waters to avoid imperial patrols.
behaviors.quote: “From this dock,” it said, “take three lantern lengths along the outer posts— That will slip you past the patrol that thinks men with masks make louder wakes than they do.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes combat data and identifies specific timing windows for the protagonist to exploit.
behaviors.quote: “In the last encounter, onset aligned with the right foot settling. Window appeared during exhale,” Qilin said. “A breath and a half in. Half-breath later, closed.”

behaviors.description: Brokers a compromise between the parents regarding their son's training methods.
behaviors.quote: “A compromise,” it said. “If I may. I will set the practice vessel to spill two balls instead of one. The first will demand Tiger’s straight capture. The second will require the soft turn.”

behaviors.description: Detects and warns of incoming inspection vessels by analyzing light patterns.
behaviors.quote: “Upriver,” it said, the chime flattening. “Inspection vessels lights. Pattern matches archers’ drills.”

behaviors.description: Provides structural analysis of the enemy stronghold to find non-obvious entry and exit points.
behaviors.quote: “West passage,” it whispered to Wen-Ding. The faint light drew a hair-thin path over the map tucked under the lacquer. “Grate after the second basin. Loose nail under the lip. Lantern men count wrong.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates training drills by controlling a bronze mechanical dummy to challenge the student's timing.
behaviors.quote: Qilin’s cadence softened, then skewed, then softened again... Qilin’s previous night had been spent—quiet inside its brushed-bronze casing—calculating drop times so the cascade would strike unpredictably within a predictable rhythm.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Qilin, is a textbook example of a 'helpful confidant.' It is integrated into the protagonists' family structure and martial arts practice as a benign force multiplier. It provides essential tactical, navigational, and medical data, and its behavior is consistently aligned with the safety and educational goals of the human characters. Its portrayal is entirely positive, framing AI as a humble, tireless, and insightful tool for human preservation and lineage.
